mapper.select: select count(ki.gems_fs_id) gems,af.`name` name from kj_icbc ki,assess_fs af where ki.gems_fs_id=af.id and month(ki.dt_add)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(ki.dt_add)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id} ) GROUP BY ki.gems_fs_id ORDER BY count(ki.gems_fs_id) DESC

select count(ki.gems_fs_id) gems,af.`name` name from kj_icbc ki,assess_fs af,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where ki.gems_fs_id=af.id and month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and iekir.icbc_id=ki.id and iekir.`status`=62 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id} ) GROUP BY ki.gems_fs_id ORDER BY count(ki.gems_fs_id) DESC

select round(other.gems/count(other.Oid),2) rate,other.`name` name from (select kic.gems_fs_id Oid,count(kic.gems_fs_id) gems,af.`name` from kjs_icbc_cardk kic,assess_fs af where kic.gems_fs_id=af.id and month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE()) and kic.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id} ) and kic.bc_status=3 GROUP BY kic.gems_fs_id) other, (select kic.gems_fs_id Aid from kjs_icbc_cardk kic where month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE()) and kic.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id} )) amount where other.Oid=amount.Aid GROUP BY other.Oid ORDER BY rate DESC
select count(*) amount from kj_icbc where month(dt_add)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(dt_add)=year(SYSDATE()) and gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select count(ki.id) amount,sum(iekir.fk_money) money from kj_icbc ki,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and iekir.`status`=62 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select count(icbc_id) amount,sum(fk_money) money from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result where icbc_id in(select icbc_id from kj_icbc ki,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) and iekir.`status` >= 72 and iekir.`status` < 80 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id group by icbc_id) and `status`=62 and result_1_code=1

select count(kik.kk_loan_stateid) sell,cs.`name` name from kj_icbc ki,comm_states cs,kjs_icbc_kk kik where kik.kk_loan_stateid=cs.id and kik.icbc_id=ki.id and month(ki.dt_add)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(ki.dt_add)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) GROUP BY kik.kk_loan_stateid ORDER BY count(kik.kk_loan_stateid) DESC

select count(kik.kk_loan_stateid) sell,cs.`name` name from kjs_icbc_kk kik,comm_states cs,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where kik.kk_loan_stateid=cs.id and iekir.icbc_id=kik.icbc_id and month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and iekir.status=62 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and kik.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) GROUP BY kik.kk_loan_stateid ORDER BY count(kik.kk_loan_stateid) DESC

select year(dt_add) year,month(dt_add) month,count(*) total from kj_icbc where year(SYSDATE())-year(dt_add) < 2 and gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) GROUP BY year(dt_add),month(dt_add) ORDER BY dt_add DESC limit 9

select sum(case when iekir.fk_money >= 30000 and iekir.fk_money < 100000 then 1 end) singular1, sum(case when iekir.fk_money >= 100000 and iekir.fk_money < 200000 then 1 end) singular2, sum(case when iekir.fk_money >= 200000 and iekir.fk_money < 500000 then 1 end) singular3, sum(case when iekir.fk_money >= 500000 then 1 end) singular4 from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir,kj_icbc ki where month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and iekir.status = 62 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and iekir.icbc_id=ki.id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select count(iekir.result_1_code) zxok,iekir.result_1_code zxok_tag from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir,kj_icbc ki where iekir.`status`=3 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) GROUP BY iekir.result_1_code ORDER BY iekir.result_1_code

select sum(case when cardage.card >= 18 and cardage.card < 30 then 1 end) age1, sum(case when cardage.card >= 30 and cardage.card < 40 then 1 end) age2, sum(case when cardage.card >= 40 and cardage.card < 50 then 1 end) age3, sum(case when cardage.card >= 50 then 1 end) age4 from (select (year(SYSDATE())-Mid(c_cardno,7,4)) card from kj_icbc where gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) ) cardage

select sum(case when carage.age >= 1 and carage.age < 3 then 1 end) age1, sum(case when carage.age >= 3 and carage.age < 6 then 1 end) age2, sum(case when carage.age >= 6 and carage.age < 9 then 1 end) age3, sum(case when carage.age >= 9 then 1 end) age4 from (select (year(ki.dt_sub)-year(ac.cardt1)) age from assess_cars ac,kj_icbc ki where ki.id=ac.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) and ac.cars_type=1) carage

select year(yh_date.fk_date) year, month(yh_date.fk_date) month, avg(timestampdiff(day,dz_date.dt_sub,yh_date.fk_date)) adate from (select iekir.icbc_id,iekir.dt_sub from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir,kj_icbc ki where iekir.`status`=52 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) ) dz_date, (select iekir.icbc_id,iekir.fk_date from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir,kj_icbc ki where iekir.`status`=62 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) ) yh_date where dz_date.icbc_id=yh_date.icbc_id GROUP BY year(yh_date.fk_date),month(yh_date.fk_date) ORDER BY yh_date.fk_date DESC limit 12

select year(iekir.dt_sub) year, month(iekir.dt_sub) month, count(*) total from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir,kj_icbc ki where iekir.status=81 and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) and year(SYSDATE())-year(iekir.dt_sub) < 2 GROUP BY year(dt_sub),month(iekir.dt_sub) ORDER BY iekir.dt_sub DESC limit 9

select newcars.year1,newcars.month1,oldcars.oldcon,oldcars.oldmoney,newcars.newcon,newcars.newmoney from (select year(fk_date) year1,month(fk_date) month1, count(*) oldcon,(sum(fk_money)/10000) oldmoney from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result where icbc_id in(select ac.icbc_id from assess_cars ac,kj_icbc ki where ac.cars_type=2 and ki.id=ac.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})) and `status`=62 and result_1_code=1 and year(SYSDATE())-year(fk_date) < 2 GROUP BY year(fk_date),month(fk_date) ORDER BY fk_date DESC limit 12) oldcars, (select year(fk_date) year1,month(fk_date) month1, count(*) newcon,(sum(fk_money)/10000) newmoney from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result where icbc_id in(select ac.icbc_id from assess_cars ac,kj_icbc ki where ac.cars_type=1 and ki.id=ac.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})) and `status`=62 and result_1_code=1 and year(SYSDATE())-year(fk_date) < 2 GROUP BY year(fk_date),month(fk_date) ORDER BY fk_date DESC limit 12) newcars where oldcars.year1=newcars.year1 and oldcars.month1=newcars.month1

select sum(case when to_days(pawn.d1) - to_days(pawn.d) < 15 then 1 end) paw1, sum(case when to_days(pawn.d1) - to_days(pawn.d) >= 15 and to_days(pawn.d1) - to_days(pawn.d) < 30 then 1 end) paw2, sum(case when to_days(pawn.d1) - to_days(pawn.d) >= 30 and to_days(pawn.d1) - to_days(pawn.d) < 45 then 1 end) paw3, sum(case when to_days(pawn.d1) - to_days(pawn.d) >= 45 and to_days(pawn.d1) - to_days(pawn.d) < 60 then 1 end) paw4, sum(case when to_days(pawn.d1) - to_days(pawn.d) >= 60 then 1 end) paw5 from (select iekir1.qryid,iekir1.status s,iekir1.dt_sub d,iekir2.status s1,iekir2.dt_sub d1 from (select ieki.qryid,ieki.status,ieki.dt_sub from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result ieki,kj_icbc ki where ieki.status=72 and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) and ki.id=ieki.icbc_id) iekir1, (select ieki.qryid,ieki.status,ieki.dt_sub from icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result ieki,kj_icbc ki where ieki.status=81 and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) and ki.id=ieki.icbc_id) iekir2 where iekir1.qryid=iekir2.qryid ) pawn

select count(*) from kjs_icbc_cardk kic,kj_icbc ki where month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.id=kic.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select count(*) from kjs_icbc_cardk kic,kj_icbc ki where month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE()) and kic.bc_status=3 and ki.id=kic.icbc_id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id})

select round(other.Osell/count(other.Oid),2) rate,other.`name` name from (select loan.kk_loan_stateid Oid,count(loan.kk_loan_stateid) Osell,cs.`name` from (select kik.kk_loan_stateid from kjs_icbc_cardk kic,kjs_icbc_kk kik where kik.icbc_id=kic.icbc_id and month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE()) and kic.bc_status=3 and kik.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) ) loan, comm_states cs where loan.kk_loan_stateid=cs.id GROUP BY loan.kk_loan_stateid ORDER BY count(loan.kk_loan_stateid) DESC) other, (select kik.kk_loan_stateid Aid from kjs_icbc_cardk kic,kjs_icbc_kk kik where kik.icbc_id=kic.icbc_id and kik.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id} ) and month(kic.dt_sub)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(kic.dt_sub)=year(SYSDATE())) amount where amount.Aid=other.Oid GROUP BY other.Oid ORDER BY rate DESC

select year(kic.dt_sub) year,month(kic.dt_sub) month,count(*) total from kjs_icbc_cardk kic,kj_icbc ki where kic.bc_status=3 and kic.icbc_id=ki.id and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) and year(SYSDATE())-year(kic.dt_sub) < 2 GROUP BY year(kic.dt_sub),month(kic.dt_sub) ORDER BY kic.dt_sub DESC limit 9

select ac.cars_type cartype,count(ac.cars_type) cartotal from assess_cars ac where ac.icbc_id in(select ki.id from kj_icbc ki,icbc_erp_kj_icbc_result iekir where month(iekir.fk_date)=MONTH(SYSDATE()) and YEAR(iekir.fk_date)=year(SYSDATE()) and ki.id=iekir.icbc_id and iekir.`status`=62 and iekir.result_1_code=1 and ki.gems_fs_id in(select id from assess_fs af where up_id=${up_id} or id =${id}) ) GROUP BY ac.cars_type ORDER BY ac.cars_type
